properties.areaDesc: Wayne, IL; White, IL; Gallatin, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 9:47AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in
Illinois...

Little Wabash River at Carmi

.Heavy rainfall over the past 36 hours in Southern Illinois has
caused water levels to rise along the Little Wabash River at Carmi.
Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast with a
crest of 34.9 feet Thursday night, just below major flood stage.
Afterwards, the river will slowly fall.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Little Wabash River at Carmi
* until further notice.
* At  8:30 AM Saturday the stage was 27.3 feet.
* Flood Stage is 27.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 34.9 feet by
Thursday night, then begin slowly falling.
* Impact...At 35.5 Feet...Businesses just downstream of IL Route 14
and Route 1 in Carmi flood.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
